means: （因违反协议、犯规、受罚等）丧失，失去( forfeit的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Because he broke the rules, he forfeited his winnings.
sentence.Network_cn: 他犯规, 所以丧失了奖金.

sentence.Network_en: He has forfeited a lucrative fee but feels his well-being is more important.
sentence.Network_cn: 他主动放弃了可观的酬金，觉得自己的健康更加重要。

sentence.Network_en: He has forfeited the right to be the leader of this nation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他丧失了作为这个国家领导的权利.

list.abs: called game 有效比赛forfeited game 比赛弃权batting average 安打率

entry.def: If you forfeit something, you lose it or are forced to give it up because you have broken a rule or done something wrong.

example.ex: He was ordered to forfeit more than £1.5m in profits...
example.tran: 下令没收了他 150 多万英镑的盈利。

example.ex: He argues that murderers forfeit their own right to life.
example.tran: 他辩称杀人犯本身已经丧失了生存的权利。

entry.def: If you forfeit something, you give it up willingly, especially so that you can achieve something else.

example.ex: He has forfeited a lucrative fee but feels his well-being is more important...
example.tran: 他主动放弃了可观的酬金，觉得自己的健康更加重要。

example.ex: Do you think that they would forfeit profit in the name of safety?
example.tran: 你认为他们会为了安全而放弃利润吗？

entry.def: A forfeit is something that you have to give up because you have done something wrong.

example.ex: That is the forfeit he must pay.

auth_sentence.content: He ran away three times and three times forfeited his wages.
auth_sentence.res_content: He ran away three times and three times forfeited his wages.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He ran away three times and three times forfeited his wages.

auth_sentence.content: My life and effects were all forfeited to the English government.
auth_sentence.res_content: My life and effects were all forfeited to the English government.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My life and effects were all forfeited to the English government.

auth_sentence.content: Biden's own party has all but forfeited the chance to make this case.
auth_sentence.res_content: Biden's own party has all but forfeited the chance to make this case.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Biden's own party has all but forfeited the chance to make this case.
